title: California Zephyr Timetable
heading: Amtrak's California Zephyr
bottom_text:
Local connecting trains are provided:
at Chicago and Naperville by Metra,
at Denver by RTD,
at Provo and Salt Lake City by Utah Transit Authority Frontrunner and TRAX services,
at Sacramento by Sacramento RT Light Rail,
and at Richmond by BART with connections to San Francisco.
